backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining document types, storage, authentication checks, and CRUD plus filtering logic for documents.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping highâ€‘level feature requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining theme tokens for light/dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML bootstrap file providing the root container and loading the frontend entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router configuring routes for dashboard, documents, upload, and detail pages within AuthGate and AppShell.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper using Internet Identity, showing a login card until the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Action menu for individual documents supporting viewing, downloading, and deleting with confirmation and navigation.
UI component for searching and filtering documents by category, office, direction, dates, and text with reset logic and dependent office options.
Displays a table of documents with selection, navigation, and load-more functionality including icons and metadata.
frontend/src/components/documents/EmptyS: Shows a placeholder screen with an image and button prompting users to upload a document when none exist.
Main layout with header, navigation, theme toggle, and user menu, wrapping application content.
frontend/src/features/categories/useCate: React Query hook that fetches category data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDelet: Mutation hook to delete a document and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/documents/useDocum: Fetches a single document by ID using React Query and the backend actor.
Fetches filtered documents from backend, applies client-side text search and pagination.
frontend/src/features/documents/useUploa: Handles document upload including file reading, base64 conversion, metadata creation, and backend submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and lifecycle of authenticated or anonymous backend actors, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and loading identities from storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with utility helpers.
frontend/src/lib/categoryHelpers.ts: Maps backend Category values to human-readable labels and provides category select options.
frontend/src/lib/exportDocuments.ts: Converts document data into CSV format and triggers a downloadable export.
frontend/src/lib/officeHelpers.ts: Maps Office union types to display labels and converts string identifiers to Office objects.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays a grid of categories and navigates to document listings on selection.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed information and preview for a selected document with related actions.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentListPage.tsx: Page component that loads, filters, selects, and exports documents with UI for filters, list display, and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/UploadDocumentPage.ts: Page for uploading a document with file input, metadata fields, validation, and upload progress handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, architecture notes, and pending feature requests for a document app.
